inputs.name: ConnectionQuestion
inputs.value: Can you descrive the status of the connection reported here: @{body('Get_Information_about_Connection')}. Please insert the connection name, the resource group where is placed and any other type of useful information.

body.prompt: Create a detailed report on what type of resources I have using this output:@{items('For_each_Resource')}. Explain what type of resource is, the resource name, in what resource group is and how the resource works. Explain to me if is a IaaS, PaaS or SaaS resource. If possibile send me documentation from Microsoft Docs and information about the billing of the resource.
@{items('For_each_User')}. Give me more information about the user in the output. If possibile add information about his unique identifier.
